title: Christmas Santa Watch Face
summary: Enjoy the cool Christmas Watch Face & Count Down

descriptionHTML:
Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188


Model Number
DW-D44

Category
Creative

Christmas Santa Watch Face Watch Face is exceptional watch face & Christmas Count Down for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle.

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)



INTERACTIVE MODE INCLUDE:

 Change Between Clock & Count Down
 Turn On/ Off Santa Animation
 Turn On/ Off Snow Animation
 Switch Between 12H & 24H
 Enable / Disable Interactive Touch

It has following features

 Interactive Watch
 Christmas COUNT DOWN
 Animated Christmas Theme
 Animation Snow Falling
 12/24H Time format
 Date
 5 Beautiful Default
Colored Ambient Modes
 Custom Ambient Mode
With Unlimited Colors
 FULL-COLORED Ambient Mode Option
 square & round watches support

Configuration:
 Change Between Clock & Count Down
 Turn On/ Off Santa Animation
 Turn On/ Off Snow Animation
 Switch Between 12H & 24H
 Show & Hide Date
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode
 Switch To FULL-COLORED Ambient Mode Option
 Change Ambient Mode Color
 Enable / Disable Interactive Touch

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com


Tip
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Christmas Santa Watch Face Watch Face as your watch face
Note


Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Great! Super cute! A little fussy to find settings in your phone but I figured it out after a few minutes. Works great!

ADS on a paid app, really? I'm okay with ads on free apps, but I shouldn't have to deal with them on apps I pay for... that's the main reason why I will choose the paid versions. Shouldn't be both. Refunded.

Adorable A very adorable watch face. Having the little scene play out, with Santa landing and the children grabbing presents, is very charming and fun. I was surprised how smooth the animation is, and while it will probably drain your battery more than a less animated one, I never felt it was doing so at an unacceptable rate. Just be sure to have your watch either turn the screen off or go into ambient mode after being touched.
Amazing face Probably the best Christmas face I have downloaded all season. Great job!
